title: Uninformed Search Algorithms
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
- **BFS (Breadth First)**: Level by level. Complete. Optimal (if step cost = 1). High Memory (O(b^d)).
- **DFS (Depth First)**: Deep dive. Not Complete (loops). Low Memory (O(bd)).
- **UCS (Uniform Cost)**: Dijkstra's Algo. Explores cheapest path first.

common_mistakes.correction: DFS returns *a* path, usually not the shortest.

exam_notes: IDS (Iterative Deepening) combines benefits of BFS and DFS.
